section: Nuance Data means any Data that is (i) owned by a Third Party and licensed to the Nuance Group as of immediately prior to the Distribution pursuant to a Nuance Data Agreement or (ii) owned by the Nuance Group as of immediately prior to the Distribution but subject to a Nuance Data Agreement, in each case (i) and (ii), which Data is used in the SpinCo Business as of immediately prior to the Distribution.
explanation: The definition of Nuance Data includes data owned by a third party and licensed to Nuance, and also data owned by Nuance but *subject to* a Nuance Data Agreement.  This seems contradictory. Why would Nuance need a 'Nuance Data Agreement' for data they already own?

section: In the event of conflict or inconsistency between the provisions of this Agreement or the Separation Agreement, the provisions of this Agreement shall prevail.
explanation: This statement creates a potential conflict because it prioritizes this Intellectual Property Agreement over the Separation Agreement. However, the Separation Agreement is referenced extensively throughout this document as the foundational agreement dictating the terms of the spin-off and allocation of assets. Overriding the Separation Agreement with this IP Agreement could disrupt the entire intended structure of the separation.

section: Subject to Section 11.02 and Section 11.05, in the event of any actual or threatened default in, or breach of, any of the terms, conditions and provisions of this Agreement, the affected Party shall have the right to specific performance and injunctive or other equitable relief of its rights under this Agreement, in addition to any and all other rights and remedies at Law or in equity, and all such rights and remedies shall be cumulative. The other Party shall not oppose the granting of such relief on the basis that money damages are an adequate remedy. The Parties agree that the remedies at Law for any breach or threatened breach hereof, including monetary damages, are inadequate compensation for any loss and that any defense in any action for specific performance that a remedy at Law would be adequate is waived. Any requirements for the securing or posting of any bond or similar security with such remedy are waived.
explanation: The contract states that the other party will not oppose to granting of such relief on the basis that money damages are an adequate remedy. It also states that remedies at Law for any breach or threatened breach hereof, including monetary damages, are inadequate compensation for any loss and that any defense in any action for specific performance that a remedy at Law would be adequate is waived. These sentences are similar and could cause ambiguity and potentially be misaligned in text.
